targets.expr: sum(avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * $hours + avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * $hours)

sum(avg(pv_hourly_cost) by (persistentvolume) * $hours * avg(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) 
+
sum(sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{device!="tmpfs", id="/"}) by (instance) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) * $localStorageGBCost

# Compute
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * $hours +
  avg(node_gpu_hourly_cost) by (node) * $hours
) +


# Memory
sum(
  avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * avg(node_ram_hourly_cost) by (node) * $hours
) +

# Storage 
sum(avg(pv_hourly_cost) by (persistentvolume) * $hours * avg(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) 
+
sum(sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{device!="tmpfs", id="/"}) by (instance) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) * $localStorageGBCost

# Net
+ sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{device="eth0"}[60m]) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) * (60 * 60 ) * $hours * $egressCost

(
 sum(
   count(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id="/"}[10m])) by (instance)
   * on (instance) 
   sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id="/"}[10m])) by (instance)
 ) 
 / 
 sum(avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node))
) * 100

(
 sum(avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace!=""}) by (pod, container))
 /
 sum(avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node))
) * 100

sum (
 avg(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 sum(pod_pvc_allocation) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
) /
sum (
 avg(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
) * 100

count(
 count(avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core", container!="",container!="POD"}[24h])) by (pod)
 * on (pod) group_right()
 count(kube_pod_container_status_running) by (pod)
)
avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost or up * 0) by (node) * $hours

# CPU  
avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node) * avg(node_cpu_hourly_cost or up * 0) by (node) * $hours 
+
# Memory
avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * avg(node_ram_hourly_cost) by (node) * $hours
+
# Disk
sum(label_replace(container_fs_limit_bytes{device!="tmpfs", id="/"}, "node", "$1", "instance", "(.*)")) by (node) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * $localStorageGBCost

sum(avg(pv_hourly_cost) by (persistentvolume) * $hours * avg(kube_persistentvolume_capacity_bytes) by (persistentvolume) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) 
+
sum(sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{device!="tmpfs", id="/"}) by (instance) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024) * $localStorageGBCost

(
 sum(
   count(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id="/"}[10m])) by (instance)
   * on (instance) 
   sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id="/"}[10m])) by (instance)
 ) 
 / 
 sum(avg(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node))
) * 100

(
 sum(
   count(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id="/"}[10m])) by (instance)
   * on (instance) 
   sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{id="/"}[10m])) by (instance)
 ) 
 / 
 sum(avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node))
) * 100

(
 sum(avg(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace!=""}) by (pod, container))
 /
 sum(avg(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node))
) * 100

sum (
 avg(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 sum(pod_pvc_allocation) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
) /
sum (
 avg(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
) * 100

count(
 count(avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core", container!="",container!="POD",node="$node"}[24h])) by (pod)
 * on (pod) group_right()
 count(kube_pod_container_status_running) by (pod)
)

sum(label_replace(label_replace(
avg(avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", container!="",container!="POD",node="$node"}[24h])) by (pod),
"container_name","$1","container","(.+)"), "pod_name","$1","pod","(.+)")
or up * 0
) by (pod_name)

panels.title: POD资源监控(最近一天平均)

list.label: Cost per Gb hour for attached disks
list.name: localStorageGBCost
